name: Hard Sci Fi Movies Quiz / Test | Movie Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: One of the better sci fi movies was 'The Day the Earth Stood Still'. Who was the star?
questions.explanation:
Michael Rennie.

	I don't believe that he had too many starring roles

questions.text: 'Forbidden Planet' was also entertaining. Who played the not-quite-mad-scientist?
questions.explanation:
Walter Pidgeon.

	With Leslie Nielsen and Anne Francis

questions.text: 'The House of Wax' is considered a classic by some. Who was the star?
Who played the lead in 'War of the Worlds'?
questions.explanation:
Gene Barry.

	Based on the story by H.G. Wells

questions.text: 'The Invisible Man' was a classic. Who played the title role?
Who played the male lead in 'The Uninvited'?
questions.explanation:
Ray Milland.

	Ray Milland in a sci fi?

questions.text: 'The Incredible Shrinking Man' was a popular movie. Who played the title role?
questions.explanation:
Grant Williams.

	Short story by Richard Matheson

questions.text: 'The Time Machine' was enjoyable due (in part)to the easygoing style of Rod Taylor. Who played his 'girl friend' in the future?
'The Exorcist' may be the best of the genre. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
William Blatty.

	Blockbuster book and movie

questions.text: 'Invasion of the Body Snatchers' was also quite popular. Who was the star?
